snippet.title: Like A Dragon: Pirate Yakuza In Hawaii - Naval Combat Reveal | Xbox Partner Preview 2024
snippet.description: RGG Studios' new grand adventure sees its iconic unhinged anti-hero Goro Majima step into the shoes of being a pirate. Yes, a pirate. The all new entry in the Like A Dragon series will have you swashbuckling through naval battles, and doing all things a pirate does, but as a member of the Yakuza. Like A Dragon: Pirate Yakuza In Hawaii is expected to release February 21, 2024.
